page.title: 08SPORTS CLUBS
page.content: Clacton swimming club provides a wide range of swimming activites and is based at Clacton's{Vista Road {Recreation Ground.}On the site are a number of sports i.e football, rugby and hockey pitches. There is one roller skating rink and a childrens playground.{Valley Farm}has pitch n putt, bowls and tennis.{Clacton Golf {Course}is along West Road opposite Clacton Airstrip. {Eastcliff Recreation Ground}has a number of activites like running, javelin, long jump, high jump and football.{Rush Green}has got a cross country run with obstacles on the way. It also has some apparatus for young children to play on.
